#summary Use Cases

This is just a list of Use Cases we should have

  * Signing up at the site
  * User wants to add artist to be alerted about
    * This should be two separate ones because the user can add artist through the web site or through an external application
  * User wants to rate a new album they purchased legally
  * User wants to purchase an album
  * User is notified of a new album releases
  * User recommends an album to another user
  * User received a recommendation from another user
